channel.title: MongoDB on See Hiong's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in MongoDB on See Hiong's Blog

item.title: Log Management with Graylog
item.description: Explore setting up Graylog in your HomeLab for comprehensive log management. Configure MongoDB and OpenSearch, deploy Fluent Bit for log forwarding, and implement advanced features like Grok patterns and pipelines. Troubleshoot efficiently with tools like netshoot and tcpdump. Enhance your HomeLab environment with a scalable and efficient log management solution.
